## page 15
```{python, echo=TRUE}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.rand(1000)*2-1
plt.hist(x)
plt.title('Histogram of X')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.show()
```

## page 17
```{python, echo=TRUE}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.exponential(1/5,size=10000)
plt.title('Histogram of X')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.hist(x,bins=20)
plt.show()
```
